remarks: The trace of a lattice translation is an atom or zero.  (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2013.)
statement:
trl0a.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
trl0a.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trl0a.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trl0a.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trl0a.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlator0 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( ( R ` F ) e. A \/ ( R ` F ) = .0. ) ) $.
